item.title: Migrating CI tool from travis to circleci for hugo blog on ghpages
item.description: When Travis CI was acquired by Idera, it didn’t take long to cease its support for open source projects. This affected this blog since I overengineered it to learn some dev-ops skills. As result, I was forced to migrate the continuous integration (CI) tool from Travis to CircleCI. While I was at it, I took advantage and included a docker image for the build instead of declaring the dependencies installation as part of the CI build.
